class Tester(ProductDatabase, Helpers):
  class Meta:
    table_name = os.environ.get('DATABASE_TABLE_NAME')
    region = os.environ.get('REGION')
  pass

products = list(Tester.scan(limit=2))
df = pd.DataFrame()
productSeries = products[0].toSeries()
productSeries = productSeries.rename(products[0].cprcode)
df.append(productSeries)
